mapper.sql: OBJECT_ID, SCHOOL_SHORT_NAME, SCHOOL_NAME, SCHOOL_PHONE, SCHOOL_ADDRESS, SCHOOL_LON, SCHOOL_LAT, SCHOOL_REGION, SCHOOL_NATURE, SCHOOL_GRADE, SCHOOL_INTRO, SCHOOL_TEACHER, SCHOOL_COST, SCHOOL_COURSE, SCHOOL_RATE, SCHOOL_REQUISITION, SCHOOL_FLOW, AUDIT_STATUS, STATUS, ADD_TIME, UPD_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_school
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_school (OBJECT_ID, SCHOOL_SHORT_NAME, SCHOOL_NAME, SCHOOL_PHONE, SCHOOL_ADDRESS, SCHOOL_LON, SCHOOL_LAT, SCHOOL_REGION, SCHOOL_NATURE, SCHOOL_GRADE, SCHOOL_INTRO, SCHOOL_TEACHER, SCHOOL_COST, SCHOOL_COURSE, SCHOOL_RATE, SCHOOL_REQUISITION, SCHOOL_FLOW, AUDIT_STATUS, STATUS, ADD_TIME, UPD_TIME ) values (#{objectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{schoolShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolLon,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{schoolLat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{schoolRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolNature,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{schoolGrade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{schoolIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolTeacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolCourse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolRequisition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

mapper.update:
update t_school
OBJECT_ID = #{record.objectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SCHOOL_SHORT_NAME = #{record.schoolShortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHOOL_NAME = #{record.schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHOOL_PHONE = #{record.schoolPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
